mapper.select: SELECT t1.`name` AS courseName,t2.id,t2.`name`,t2.create_time publishDate,t2.path as jobPath, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_student_course c WHERE c.course_id=t1.id) studentNumber, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_student_homework h WHERE h.homework_id=t2.id AND h.`status`=1) undoneNumber, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_student_homework h WHERE h.homework_id=t2.id AND h.`status`=2) unreviewedNumber FROM t_course t1 JOIN t_homework t2 ON t1.id=t2.course_id WHERE t1.teacher_id=#{teacherId} ORDER BY t2.create_time DESC
SELECT t1.*,t1.finish_time AS finishTime,t2.`name` AS studentName,t2.icon FROM t_student_homework t1 JOIN t_student t2 ON t1.student_id=t2.id WHERE t1.homework_id=#{homeworkId} ORDER BY t1.id
